description: VIA Rail Canada is offering and selling beers, depending of the contract type, on all of its trains across Canada and is seeking suppliers capable of supplying various types of beers in one or several provinces. Products will be delivered in one or the other of the following cities: Halifax, Downtown Montreal, Toronto, Winnipeg and Vancouver.
full_summary:
================================

**Title**
--------

### Beer Supply for On-Board Services

Contract Reference Number: MX-42868254612
Amendment Number: 3
Publication Date: 2023-09-19

**Tender Details**
-------------------

* Tender Closing Date: 2023-10-20T17:00:00 (Expired)
* Expected Contract Start Date: N/A
* Expected Contract End Date: N/A

**Procurement Category**
------------------------

* Goods and Services (GD)

**Procurement Method**
-----------------------

* Competitive - Open bidding

**Trade Agreements**
--------------------

* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)

**Contracting Entity**
----------------------

* VIA Rail Canada Inc.
	+ Address: 3 Place Ville-Marie, Suite 500, Montreal, Quebec H3B 2C9, Canada
* Contact Person: Jean-François Daviault
	+ Email: jean-francois_daviault@viarail.ca
	+ Phone: 514-871-6702

**Tender Description**
------------------------

Via Rail Canada requires suppliers to provide various types of beers for on-board services across Canada. Products will be delivered in the following cities: Halifax, Montreal, Toronto, Winnipeg, and Vancouver. Bidding and documents are available on the MERX website (http://www.merx.com). Fees may apply; please visit https://www.merx.com/public/pricing for more information.

**Notice Links**
----------------

* English: https://www.merx.com/public/solicitations/2621427403/abstract?language=EN
* French: https://www.merx.com/public/solicitations/2621427403/abstract?language=FR

Note that I have removed unnecessary information, condensed the text, and ensured that all relevant details are included in the rewritten entry. I have also paid attention to grammar, spelling, and punctuation to make the text more professional. Let me know if you need any further assistance.
